src_original: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
tgt_original: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum ||45 ||

src_original: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
tgt_original: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ |

src_original: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham // Saund_7.46 //
tgt_original: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo'ham ||46 ||

src_original: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
tgt_original: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam |

src_original: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya // Saund_7.47 //
tgt_original: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya ||47 ||

src_original: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
tgt_original: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ |

src_original: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48 //
tgt_original: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so'sti ca nāsti caiva ||48 ||

src_original: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ /  pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49 //
tgt_original: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ |  pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ ||49 ||

src_original: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
tgt_original: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo'pi hi me vicāraḥ |

src_original: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ // Saund_7.50 //
tgt_original: so'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ ||50 ||

src_original: śālbādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ /
tgt_original: śālbādhipo hi sasuto'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ |

src_original: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51 //
tgt_original: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ ||51 ||

src_original: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayātas
tgt_original: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayāt-

src_original: tyaktvā kāṣāyaṃ ṛhamahamitastāvadeva prayāsye /
tgt_original: styaktvā kāṣāyaṃ gṛhamahamitastāvadeva prayāsye |

src_original: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher
tgt_original: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddhe-

src_original: nāmutrārthaḥ syādupahatamaternāpyayaṃ jīvalokaḥ // Saund_7.52 //
tgt_original: rnāmutrārthaḥ syādupahatamaternāpyayaṃ jīvalokaḥ ||52 ||

src_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “nandavilāpa” nāma saptama sarga samāpta /
tgt_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “nanda-vilāpa“ nāma saptama sarga samāpta |
